page.title: 08A child's typical day.
page.content: After washing and dressing in my school uniform I go downnstairs for breakfast of cereals, piece of buttered toast and drink of tea. I get to school for 8.55. a.m. where we have registration followed by assembly which consists of prayers, a story and songs. Our first lesson is usually Maths and then after a 15 minute break we have English untill noon. In the afternoon we may do P.E. or Art and Craft or Science. School finishes at 3.25 p.m.. After school I change out of school uniform and call for my friend. We sometimes play tennis or have a game on my computer. I go home at 9.00 p.m. and watch television until I go to bed at 9.30 p.m. (By Anna Jenkinson) aged 11 years)
